Body:
im trying to get a varible from ubidots on omega2, this variable is a json dict and the values are 1 or 0 (its a switch). When a start the code remind me list index out of range error. (sorry for my english :( )
Error: File main.py"
column9:
line 23 in main if tapparellasu[0]['value']: IndexError: list index out of range

The output of: print (tapparellasu) is [] and the output of print TapparellaSu is the name of the Ubidots variable (and so the program can get the ubidots variable but i can read the value from the dict.)

import os	import json	import onionGpio	import time	import ubidots	from ubidots import ApiClient	api = ApiClient(token='wefwfwfwefwefwefwefrwgewrgerfgwef')	gpio6 = onionGpio.OnionGpio(6)	gpio7 = onionGpio.OnionGpio(7)	tapparellasu = 0	status = gpio6.setOutputDirection(0)	status = gpio7.setOutputDirection(0)			def __main__():	    TapparellaSu = api.get_variable('uywqegfuywefkwaeuiyfyuwefjukghwef')	    tapparellasu = TapparellaSu.get_values(1)	    if tapparellasu[0]['value']:	        status = gpio6.setValue(1)	    else:	        status = gpio6.setValue(0)	    print tapparellasu[0]['value']	    time.sleep(1)	if __name__ == '__main__':	    __main__()
"

Body: [Edit] your Question and show the Output of `print(tapparellasu)` before `if tapparellasu[0]['value']`.
